description: A 64-year-old man from Glasgow and a 30-year-old man from County Antrim were also detained.
title: Irish men charged after migrants discovered in lorry in Belgium
title_page: Irish men charged after migrants discovered in lorry in Belgium - BBC News
maintext: The 64-year-old, who was driving the vehicle, has been remanded in custody while the man from Northern Ireland was released on bail after being questioned by National Crime Agency (NCA) officers.
